Title: Generalized MVP
Description: Ensure that the MVP works for other courses (Climate Change, Programming, China, Creative Writing).

Title: User Testing
Description: Connect with the administrators of each course and get their feedback.

Title: Deployment
Description: Migrate the code from the GitHub repository to an external server.

Title: Post-deployment tweaks
Description: Polish the product before the final presentation.

Title: Report and Presentation
Description: Write the final reports and prepare for the final presentation.
